name: Sora (itch)
description:
Hurrah! My first game made with Java and libGDX uploaded to my itch.io account! It was fun to code in this language and framework, though it was a bit annoying at times. But that's alright!

And don't ask me why the game screen is cutoff at the bottom. I have no idea why it's like that. I even tried editing the CSS and nothing changed! So I hope you can deal with it...

Either way, though, I hope you have fun with this game as much as I enjoyed creating it (^^

* Navigate through the menu by using left and right arrow keys. Press Z or ENTER to select.

** Simply click the window if it doesn't detect your input.
